title: Mushahidat

I must strike a cautionary note with regard to essentializing the category of “Wahhabi.” In the reification-ravaged world of post-9/11 United States, the category of “Wahhabi” has surfaced as the Other of the good Muslim. Even a hundred years prior to this period, Urdu and Hindi did not exist in independent, mutually-exclusive terms.
